text: Ej Parvardigori mo, ʙa on cī nozil kardaī, dar Inçil imon ovardem va ʙa pajomʙarat Iso alajhissalom pajravī namudem. Moro ʙinavis az çumlai on kasone, ki Turo ʙa jagonagiat va ʙarhaq ʙudani risolai pajomʙaronat, guvohī medihand. (Va on guvohidihandagon ummatoni Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam meʙoşand)
